definition: to catch fire/to cook/to get angry

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
a conflict arises close to home (idiom)

sentences.english: Glancing over his shoulder, he saw that the entire cab of his truck was now ablaze.
sentences.chinese: 他看到卡车的整个驾驶室都着起火来了。

sentences.english: This fire was no doubt caused by arson.
sentences.chinese: 关于起火原因及纵火者，至今众说纷纭。

sentences.english: He said four camcorders had recorded the ignition process and firework display.
sentences.chinese: 他还提到四个摄像机拍到了烟花散开及起火的过程。

sentences.english: Simon sustained 40% external burns, and also burnt his oesophagus and both lungs.
sentences.chinese: 车辆起火，他外表40%烧伤，食道及肺部皆灼伤。

sentences.english: People also dream about their house or another building being on fire.
sentences.chinese: 人们还梦见他们的房子或者其他建筑起火。

sentences.english: He ran into the burning building to save the girl.
sentences.chinese: 于是跑进起火的建筑物要救那名女孩。

sentences.english: Police are investigating the cause of the fire and say arson has not been ruled out.
sentences.chinese: 警方正在调差起火原因，并且称不排除是纵火。

sentences.english: I like firing up the grill for the first time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在一年中第一次拿出烤肉架，生起火来。

sentences.english: The danger has been caused by a new explosion at one of the reactors in the Fukushima plant, followed by a fire.
sentences.chinese: 危险起因于福岛核电站一个反应堆的爆炸并起火。

sentences.english: “Better to land at an airport where there’s actual crash-fire-rescue, ” said the pilot, who requested anonymity because he did not have his airline’s permission to speak.
sentences.chinese: 最好还是在机场降落，那里有迫降起火救援的预案。

sentences.english: They were investigating cause in the orgin.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在调查造成起火的原因。

sentences.english: Well, we went into the house and tried to light a fire, but we couldn't even do that.
sentences.chinese: 呃，我们进了屋子，想生起火来，但就是点不着。

sentences.english: The airliner broke in two upon impact and burst into flames.
sentences.chinese: 飞机着陆时断成两截并起火燃烧。

sentences.english: They rushed into the burning house to save the old man.
sentences.chinese: 他们冲入起火的房子中去救那个老人。
